information: Store Effect Energy in this vial to power your Effect Armor.
Access the Energy Vial Menu by pressing ยง3[']ยงr with the vial equipped, or by right-clicking with the vial in your main hand.
In this menu, you can fuel the vial with Effect Energy using Enriched Blaze Powder.
You can also configure which armor pieces this vial should power.
This allows the effects of Effect Armor to be toggled on/off freely, without needing to take the armor off!
